page.title: 06FARMLAND AROUND FLAX BOURTON
page.content: The land around Flax Bourton is owned by two men.Mr.Anthony Gibbs of Home Farm and Lord Wraxall of Tytsfield.Mr Gibbs is an arable farmer,his main crops being Rape,Barley and wheat.He also keeps a few sheep.Lord Wraxall has a tenant farmer,Mr.Alvis who keeps a dairy herd of Friesians,at Belmont Farm.The estate itself is gven over to arable farming.The two men do not have much machinery they both hire Contrakors.Mr.Gibbs has two hay barns and one big corn barn.Lord Wraxall's family have been in Flax Bourton since the 1800's.
